rukus.text: 52|29|sa, kare-ra ni kunkai shi nasai. Omo no onkei ni yotte, anata wa uranaishi demo kichigai demonai.
52|30|Mata kare-ra wa,`tada no shijinda. Kare no unsei ga gyakuten suru no o matou' to iu.
52|31|Gen tte yaru ga i. `Matte iruga i. Watashi mo anata gata to tomoni matte iyou.'
52|32|Ittai kare-ra no mazushi rikai-ryoku ga ko meijita no ka, soretomo kare-ra wa hogaina min'na no ka.
52|33|Matawa,`kare (muhanmado) ga kore o gisaku shita nodearu.' To iu no ka. Iya, kare-ra wa shinjite wa inai nodearu.
52|34|Moshi kare-ra no kotoba ga shinjitsunara, kore to onaji o tsuge o motte kosa seruga yoi.
52|35|Kare-ra wa mu kara tsukura reta node wanai ka. Soretomo kare-ra jishin ga sozo-shana no ka.
52|36|Soretomo kare-ra ga, ten to ji o sozo shita no ka. Iya, kare-ra ni wa shikkari shita shinko ga nai nodearu.
52|37|Soretomo kare-ra wa, anata no omo no samazamana takaramono o motte iru no ka. Matawa (jibutsu no) kanrishana no ka.
52|38|Soretomo kare-ra ni wa hashigo ga atte, sorede (ten ni nobori, sono himitsu o) kiku koto ga dekiru no ka. Sorenara kiita to iu mono ni, meikakuna shoko o motte kitasa seruga yoi.
52|39|Soretomo anata gata ni wa musuko ga atte, kare ni wa musume ga aru (dake) to iu no ka.
52|40|Soretomo anata ga, kare-ra ni hoshu o motome, sore de kare-ra wa fusai no omoni o otte iru to iu no ka.
52|41|Soretomo yugen-kai no koto ga sukkari wakatte ite, sore o kakitomete iru to iu no ka.
52|42|Soretomo (anata ni taishite) sakuwomegurasu tsumori ka. Daga haishin-sha-tachi koso, sakubo ni kakarudearou.
52|43|Soretomo kare-ra wa, arra igai ni kami ga aru to iu no ka. Arra ni tatae are, kare wa haisuru mono (jashin) no ue ni ito takaku ora reru.
52|44|Tatoe ten'noikkaku ga (kare-ra no ue ni) ochiru no o mite mo, kare-ra wa,`tsumikasanatta kumodesu.' To iudearou.
52|45|Kare-ra wa,(osore no tame ni) soko ni konto suru (shinpan no)-bi ni au made, hanatte oke.
52|46|Sonohi kare-ra no sakubo wa, nani no eki mo naku, kekkyoku kare-ra wa tasuke rarenaidearou.
52|47|Hontoni fugina okonai no mono ni wa, kono soto ni mo chobatsu ga aru. Daga, kare-ra no oku wa kidzukanai.
52|48|Sore de omo no sabaki o taeshinonde mate. Hontoni ware wa anata gata o mimamotte iru. Soshite anata ga tachiagaru toki wa,-nushi o tatae nasai.
52|49|Yonaka ni, mata shinshin ga shirizoku toki ni mo, kare o tatae nasai.
